#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#define MaxM 1000000
#define MaxMby2 500000
using namespace std;
bool prime[MaxMby2];
vector<int> balPrimes;
int temp[2]={0,2};
static bool tFlag=1;
void isBalanced(int step){
     if((temp[!tFlag]+step)==(temp[tFlag]<<1)){
            balPrimes.push_back(temp[tFlag]);                    
     }
	 tFlag=!tFlag;
     temp[tFlag]=step;
}
void PrimeGenErasto(){
	int i,j,step;
     prime[0]=1;
     for(i=1; i<MaxMby2; i++){
              if(!prime[i]){
                   step=(i<<1)+1;
                   for(j=i; j<MaxMby2; j=j+step){
                                 prime[j]=1;
                   }
                   isBalanced(step);
              }
     }
}
int main(void){
    int tcases,t;
    PrimeGenErasto();    
    scanf("%d",&tcases);
    while(tcases--){
                    scanf("%d",&t);
                    printf("%d\n",balPrimes[t-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
